extension.description: Every XBMC addon available. No prejudice against any sites or developers - this is a collection of EVERY XBMC Addon available with over 2,000 so far! BIG thanks go to blazetamer for creating the original Addon Installer that was used as a base for this new installer.

[COLOR blue]Join the Revolution[/COLOR] @ [COLOR lime][B]www.totalxbmc.tv[/B][/COLOR][CR][CR]Total Revolution is the home of Total Installer and the project is designed to get the great XBMC/Kodi community together as one. Have your say on what goes on and help design your very own skin.

extension.summary: A mod on the original Confluence by Jezz_X
extension.description: Total Revolution is a skin designed for absolute ease of use and to serve as a base for community development. Full integration is the key, with some features never seen integrated into a skin before - this also has the ability to integrate android apps into XBMC/Kodi. Whilst this was originally designed with Android in mind it has grown and is fully functional on all other platforms and whilst making a fully customisable skin we aim to keep it as low on resources as possible.
